long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OvO is an exciting game available as a Chrome Extension and can be played for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/. In this game, you control a cute and colorful creature called OvO as it navigates through a vibrant and challenging world. The objective is to help OvO collect all the colorful eggs scattered across the levels while avoiding obstacles and enemies.

As you progress through the game, the levels become more difficult, introducing new obstacles and puzzles to solve. OvO can jump, slide, and use special abilities to overcome challenges and reach the eggs. The game features colorful graphics, catchy music, and addictive gameplay that will keep you entertained for hours.

With its intuitive controls and engaging gameplay, OvO offers a fun and immersive gaming experience for players of all ages. So, visit the website and join OvO on its egg-collecting adventure in this delightful Chrome Extension game.

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://poki.ee/
